alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Lincoln; Russell; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:47PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lincoln, northern Ellsworth, Russell and Saline Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1146 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Russell to near Culver to 5 miles northeast of Gypsum. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salina, Russell, Ellsworth, Wilson, Lincoln, Gypsum, Lucas, Sylvan Grove, Brookville, Smolan, Luray, Dorrance, Beverly, New Cambria, Barnard, Glendale, Bunker Hill, Waldo, Wilson State Park, and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 83 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 180 and 266. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
